question: Re: Question 7822 - Sajda e Sahw - Does one salaam mean turning your head to the right only and then doing two Sajda's
answer:
QUESTION
One Salaam and two Sajda's. Does one salaam mean turning your head to the right only and then doing two Sajda's. Kindly advise. Wassalaam
ANSWER


Share:
Yes, making salaam only to the right and two Sajdas.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
